data.comment: The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
In the minute 2, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 8, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Rio de Janeiro Goianiense GO attack through Chico. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 10, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at São Januario.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Carlinhos.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama’s Carlinhos is on his feet again at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama's German Cano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Gustavo Ferrareis for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 26, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Renato Kayzer for Goianiense GO is whistled offside.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Andrey, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Andrey looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Talles Magno (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 34, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Chico of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Henrique Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Goianiense GO's area.
In the minute 40, Bruno Cesar (Vasco da Gama) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
In the minute 42, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 44, At São Januario, Joao Victor has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Chico gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Heber Roberto Lopes blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at São Januario.
In the minute 46, Goianiense GO's Janderson Santos de Souza is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 46, Matheus Vargas is on a sub for Marlon Freitas for Goianiense GO.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Vinicius replacing Carlinhos.
The home team have replaced Fellipe Bastos with Bruno Gomes. This is the first substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
Marlon Freitas is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Janderson Santos de Souza of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Marcos Junior is replacing Andrey for the home team.
Vinicius is booked for the home team.
In the minute 53, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Goianiense GO push upfield and Renato Kayzer gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Vasco da Gama defence.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Renato Kayzer gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Rio de Janeiro Goianiense GO drive forward through Matheus Vargas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 58, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Goianiense GO's Edson breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at São Januario.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 61, Everton Felipe is replacing Gustavo Ferrareis for Goianiense GO at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Talles Magno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
German Cano scores to make it 1-0 at São Januario.
In the minute 63, Goal! Renato Kayzer (Goianiense GO) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Rio de Janeiro.
Nicolas Vichiatto instrumental with a fine assist.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 65, Heber Roberto Lopes awards the home team a throw-in.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Bruno Cesar's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at São Januario.
The away team replace Janderson Santos de Souza with Matheuzinho.
In the minute 66, Ramon Menezes is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Ribamar replacing Bruno Cesar.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 67, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goal! A Renato Kayzer header gives Goianiense GO a 1-2 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
That's a fine assist from Matheuzinho.
In the minute 76, Goianiense GO will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Oliveira is replacing Chico for Goianiense GO at São Januario.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Matheuzinho (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramon Menezes is making the team's fifth substitution at São Januario with Ygor Catatau replacing Talles Magno.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama pushes forward through German Cano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vasco da Gama's Yago Pikachu gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, The match at São Januario has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jean, who is down injured.
Goianiense GO make their fifth substitution with Hyuri replacing Renato Kayzer.
Jean is back on his feet again.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Goianiense GO.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Matheus Vargas is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bruno Gomes (Vasco da Gama) sees red and is sent off in Rio de Janeiro!
